game.name: Disney Princess Playing Snowballs
game.description:
The lovely winter season has just come and all pretty girls look pretty excited to wear the cool warm outfits. It seems that there will be no snowfall during this winter season according to Anna. Suddenly, she realizes that her sister Elsa has decided to prepare her own snow. The popular Anna has also got an idea of inviting other two Disney princesses to get engaged in the snowball. Your job is help princesses to pick up the cool warm clothes in Disney Princess Playing Snowballs. 
 
These Disney princesses are very choosy in her outfit selection. So, try to mix and match all the possible dress and other necessary accessory options to create an amazing result. Try to complete this task as fast as you can since the princesses have to go to the snowball fight! The magical girl Elsa has used her power to begin the snow. They would love to play together with snowballs. Dress them up and then help them to drink hot cocoa together in this html5 fun princess game!

All the princesses are very happy and excited to enjoy snow fighting together. Now they have chosen you to make all the arrangements to help them to enjoy a wonderful Christmas snowball fight. Give all of them the perfect and beautiful warm clothes by clicking the mouse! All the best to create the awesome snowball dresses for your favorite Disney princesses!! Check out more girls games and play online, no download required on atmegame.com!
